name: Christmas Wonderland 14 Collector's Edition
description:
Enjoy an exciting Christmas Wonderland and Happy Holidays in Springfield. Help Santa at his North Pole Workshops. Fly in his brand New Sleigh. Visit Santa’s Amazing Virtual Reality Grotto. Take part making a Movie.

 Decorate the NEW Christmas Wonderland Town. Win fabulous Rewards & Achievements. Search for Frosty the Snowman. Take photos, make an Album. 

 The Toys are made and it’s Christmas Eve! Rudolph & team are hitched to the Sleigh. Santa flies around the World while Kids are asleep, or are they? … soon it’s another sensational Christmas Morning.

 Help Santa find Hidden Objects, Lost Presents, Gold Angels & Reindeer. Play superb Mini-Games. Earn Merit Badges.

  Christmas Wonderland 14 is crammed full of Presents & Hidden Surprises with Gorgeous Graphics and Puzzles. Join in the fun, with Captivating Christmas gameplay for Families and Friends of All abilities and ages to enjoy.
